PluginData.Author: dogboy + Klime
PluginData.Tooltip: Visual effects (smoke/fire) for thrusters, HydrogenPlusV3 compatible
PluginData.Description:
- All controls are done through the Terminal and Toolbar. Experiment with different settings to find a good effect for your grid
- Thruster must be enabled and outputting atleast 20% of its maximum thrust to generate effects
- Settings are saved in blueprints
